A technique passed down in his family, Gekomatsu creates [[chakra]] copies of [[shinobi]] living or deceased, such as [[Jiraiya]] and [[Orochimaru]]. Only [[Naruto|those]] who possess the special chakra beads can see the created chakra entities.

==Known Chakra Entities==
* Jiraiya 
* Orochimaru	
* [[Deidara]]
* [[Sasori]]	
* [[Hidan]]
* [[Kakuzu]]	
* [[Hiruzen Sarutobi]]	
* [[Deva Path|Pain]] 
* [[Konan]]	
* [[Nagato]] 
* [[Itachi Uchiha]]	
* [[Sasuke Uchiha]]	
* [[Yugito Nii]]
* [[Yagura Karatachi]]	
* [[Rōshi]]
* [[Han]]
* [[Utakata]]
* [[Fū]]
* [[Madara Uchiha]]
* [[Obito Uchiha|Tobi]]
* [[Minato Namikaze]]
